title: Bangalore Tech Summit
description: India's biggest technology and innovation event attracting startups and IT leaders.
details:
The Bangalore Tech Summit is a flagship event celebrating India's role in the global tech ecosystem.
It features keynote speeches from global tech leaders and CEOs.
There are dedicated zones for startups to exhibit their innovations.
Workshops and panel discussions cover AI, cybersecurity, and digital transformation.
Investors and VCs participate in exclusive networking sessions.
Tech enthusiasts, developers, and students gather to exchange ideas.

title: Namma Music Fest
description: A vibrant festival celebrating music and local artists in the heart of Bangalore.
details:
Namma Music Fest brings together genres from classical to contemporary.
It features performances by emerging local bands and renowned national artists.
Live jam sessions are open to the audience.
The venue offers an open-air stage with immersive sound and light setups.
Food stalls and craft zones enhance the festival feel.
A must-attend for every music enthusiast in the city.

title: Bangalore Comic Con
description: Celebrate pop culture with cosplay, comics, and panels with creators.
details:
Bangalore Comic Con is a celebration of fandom and imagination.
It includes comic book releases, cosplay parades, and Q&A panels with creators.
Attendees can participate in fan contests and trivia battles.
Exclusive merchandise and collectibles are available on-site.
Gaming zones with VR demos keep the action going.
Fun for families, superfans, and creatives alike.

title: Chennai Literature Festival
description: A gathering of authors, poets, and readers to celebrate literature in Tamil and English.
details:
The Chennai Literature Festival brings voices from across India to discuss literature and life.
Sessions include poetry readings, author meetups, and translation panels.
Book signings and new launches are held daily.
Regional publishers exhibit rare and new titles.
Workshops support aspiring writers and storytellers.
A calm, creative space for lovers of language and story.

title: Marina Food Carnival
description: Delight your taste buds with local and international cuisine by the beach.
details:
Set along Marina Beach, this carnival is a foodie's paradise.
From spicy street food to global gourmet, every flavor is represented.
Live cooking demos feature celebrity chefs.
Interactive tasting zones and food challenges entertain all ages.
A kids' area and musical acts complete the ambiance.
Perfect for families, couples, and solo food explorers.

title: Hyderabad Startup Expo
description: Showcasing innovative startups and networking with investors and mentors.
details:
Hyderabad Startup Expo connects ideas with capital.
Startups pitch in front of angel investors and VCs.
The event includes workshops on funding, branding, and scaling.
A student innovation zone highlights young entrepreneurs.
Accelerators and incubators offer direct entry to top teams.
An essential hub for India's growing startup scene.

title: Pearl Cultural Night
description: A celebration of Telugu heritage through dance, drama, and music.
details:
Pearl Cultural Night celebrates Andhra and Telangana's rich artistic heritage.
The evening showcases classical dance, folk music, and mythological plays.
Artisans display crafts like Kalamkari and Bidriware.
Traditional cuisine is served in open-air food courts.
Performances take place under decorative lights and cultural decor.
A night of pride, nostalgia, and celebration.

title: Mumbai Film Festival
description: Premieres of Indian and international films with director Q&As.
details:
This prestigious event screens films from more than 40 countries.
Red carpet events and exclusive previews feature major Bollywood stars.
Independent films and documentaries gain spotlight.
Panels include actors, screenwriters, and directors.
Special screenings are held at sea-facing outdoor venues.
Perfect for movie buffs, critics, and film students.

title: Mumbai Marathon
description: India’s largest marathon event featuring global participants.
details:
Mumbai Marathon unites runners across distances and abilities.
Events include full marathon, half marathon, 10K, and charity runs.
The route spans iconic sites like Marine Drive and the Gateway.
Medical aid stations and hydration points ensure safety.
Entertainment zones energize runners throughout.
A city-wide celebration of endurance and community.

title: Delhi Auto Expo
description: A premier event showcasing the latest in automobiles and tech.
details:
The Delhi Auto Expo unveils cutting-edge vehicles and tech.
Electric vehicles and futuristic models take center stage.
Exhibitors include top automotive brands from India and abroad.
Test drive zones let visitors experience innovation hands-on.
Tech talks cover mobility, sustainability, and AI.
Auto fans and families enjoy a thrilling experience.

title: Delhi International Book Fair
description: Explore a massive collection of books and engage with authors.
details:
This book fair hosts over 500 publishers and thousands of titles.
Events include poetry slams, storytelling, and literary panels.
Workshops support aspiring authors and translators.
A kids' pavilion engages young readers with interactive storytelling.
Academic and competitive exam books are available at discounts.
Ideal for educators, students, and avid readers.

title: Pune Jazz Nights
description: Live jazz music performances from local and international artists.
details:
Pune Jazz Nights is a blend of classic and experimental jazz.
The event features bands from India, France, and the U.S.
An intimate, lounge-style setting enhances the vibe.
Food, wine, and acoustic ambiance complete the night.
Daytime masterclasses are led by world-class musicians.
A smooth, unforgettable musical experience.

title: Kolkata Durga Utsav
description: Experience the grandeur of Durga Puja across pandals with rituals and culture.
details:
Durga Utsav transforms Kolkata into a living celebration.
Pandals exhibit artistic creativity with unique themes.
Devotional songs, rituals, and drumbeats fill the streets.
Crowds line up to view grand idols and light shows.
Local foods and cultural stalls add flavor to the experience.
A festival of devotion, tradition, and community pride.

title: Jaipur Literature Summit
description: One of the world’s largest free literary festivals, featuring top global authors.
details:
The Jaipur Literature Summit blends scholarship and spectacle.
Authors, historians, and thinkers gather at Diggi Palace.
Sessions span literature, politics, climate, and culture.
Cultural shows, cafes, and bookstores create a lively atmosphere.
Young authors are spotlighted in debut forums.
A haven for ideas, creativity, and global perspectives.
